00083     template <typename T>
00084     inline void append (ostream &s, const string &prefix, const T val, const string &suffix=string("")) {
00085       if (!isNull(val)) s << prefix << val << suffix;
00086     }

00169     inline bool toBooleanValue (const string &obj) {
00170       boolNull b = toBoolean(obj);
00171       return ((b != _NULL) && (b == _TRUE));
00172     }

00236     inline string toStringClassID (int32_t oui, int16_t icc, int16_t pcc) {
00237       return toStringOUI(oui) + ":" + toHexString(icc,2) + "." + toHexString(pcc,2);

00291     template<typename T>
00292     inline int32_t binarySearch (const vector<T> &vec, T val) {
00293       // TODO: Change this to a binary rather than linear search.
00294       int32_t len = (int32_t)vec.size();
00295       for (int32_t i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00296         if (vec[i] == val) return i;
00297         if (vec[i] >  val) return -i-1;
00298       }
00299       return -vec.size();
00300     }
00301 
00306     inline void dumpBytes (const void *ptr, int32_t len) {
00307       std::cout<<"Dump:"<<std::endl;
00308       const unsigned char *buf  = (const unsigned char*)ptr;
00309       for(int32_t i=0; i < len; ++i) {
00310         std::cout<<std::hex<<std::setw(2)<<std::setfill('0')<<(int)(buf[i]);
00311         if (i%4 == 3) std::cout<<std::endl;
00312         else if (i%2 == 1) std::cout<<" ";
00313       }
00314     }
00315   } END_NAMESPACE
